thread.title: Charity Watchdog fights to defend anti-extremism drive in 'Jihadi John' case
thread.title_full: Charity Watchdog fights to defend anti-extremism drive in 'Jihadi John' case

author: John Bingham
title: Charity Watchdog fights to defend anti-extremism drive in 'Jihadi John' case
text: Charity Watchdog fights to defend anti-extremism drive in ‘Jihadi John’ case Legal challenge could call ability of regulator to act to stem funds to controversial group into doubt Mohammed Emwazi is 'extremely gentle', says British advocacy group By John Bingham , Social Affairs Editor 12:01AM BST 21 Oct 2015
